description:
Kishi Kyousuke is an eighteen years old man who is an assistant to http://anidb.net/ch3390 [Yarizakura Hime]. He is an Oni with superhuman strength, but wears a seal that looks like a bracelet around his left wrist. He appears to be harsh towards http://anidb.net/ch3391 [Akina] sometimes because he believes that Akina`s power is not required to protect the town.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Kishi Kyousuke
